I agree completely except that I have no pity for such a selfabsorbed megol=
omanic crybaby. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 7:38 PM
  Subject=
: Re: Suicide King


  I agree completly. JP has no respect. Why would anyo=
ne fake their death to get out of a game? And even if it were for more seri=
ous problems, wouldn't they just quit and change thier e-mail? That would b=
e so much easier than having a bunch of people who you really don't know be=
live you died.
   
  JP you are a sick person. I do hope that there is help=
 for you. And If this gets us kicked out of the game, well, I guess you got=
 your way. Ohh, and if It does, my characters will go to people besides you=
. I pity you, I really do. And that's a rare thing with me.
    ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
    From: Robert Dahl 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
   Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:22 PM
    Subject: Re: Suicide King
=


    I am not gonna make this private because I have something I have to g=
et off
    my chest. JP, what is your major malfunction?  Why can't you be =
courteous?
    If this gets me kicked out of the game, so be it. You are a =
sadistic bully.
    I've really enjoyed playing this game, except for when =
it comes to dealing
    with you. Playing with people like Roborick and Yan=
shosh, and reading posts
    by Kinger and Airly is enjoyable. But you are =
a waist of my time. Why would
    he do this to get out of a game, instead =
of just saying "I Quit" Even if it
    is a trick (which I dont believe it =
is, because I have more faith in
    people) isnt it safer to just be polit=
e? Just from reading your posts, I
    knew you would do some kind of sick =
twisted thing like this. I feel for
    you, because you obviously dont hav=
e any redeeming qualities. Go ahead and
    insult me back, with your eleme=
ntary bashing, and crude post. Nothing you
    say matters, cause everyone =
on this chat is levels above you when it comes
    to dealing with people. =
Go see a psychiatrist, because you are a royaly
    screwed up person. Get =
a life. Sorry everybody, but I have no patience for
    discusting scum.


=


          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

now the name you want? Enter the domain name below and press GO!  
        =
              www.
